name: Rise of the Forest
description:
Welcome to Rise of the Forest! In RotF you play as an archer, whose goal is to survive as long as possible in the forest before the forest claims you. Fight infinite waves of enemies as you gain points to get new skills. This game was a test run for me to learn how to develop games using Unity.

Gameplay:

Rise of the Forest is a top-down shooter game with a goal of collecting as many points as you can before you die. Dodge your way though enemy shots and hit them until they die! But be careful, the longer you last in the forest, the stronger the enemies become.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move. Left-click to shoot arrows. Right-click for ability 1. Space for ability 2 (centered on cursor). Esc to bring up pause menu.
